description: Triangle of D-analogs of Stirling numbers of 2nd kind.
links: R. Suter, Two analogues of a classical sequence, J. Integer Sequences, Vol. 3 (2000), #P00.1.8.
prog: (PARI) T(n, k)=if(k<0||k>n, 0, n!*polcoeff(polcoeff((exp(x)-x)*exp(y/2*(exp(2*x)-1)), n), k));tabl(nn) = {x = 'x + O('x^nn); for (n=0, nn, for (m=0, n, print1(T(n, m), ", ");); print(););} \\ _Michel Marcus_, May 03 2015
author: Ruedi Suter (suter(AT)math.ethz.ch)
